                           +----arjuna.JavaSim.Statistics.SimpleHistogram
public class SimpleHistogram
extends PrecisionHistogram
A simple histogram with a set number of buckets.

SimpleHistogram(double, double, double)
Create a number of buckets with width 'w' evenly distributed over the range 'min' to 'max'.
SimpleHistogram(double, double, long)
Create with 'nbuckets' evenly distributed over the range 'min' to 'max'.

print()
Print out information about the histogram.
reset()
Empty the histogram.
restoreState(DataInputStream)
Restore the histogram state from the stream 'iFile'.
restoreState(String)
Restore the histogram state from the file 'fileName'.
saveState(DataOutputStream)
Save the state of the histogram to the stream 'oFile'.
saveState(String)
Save the state of the histogram to the file named 'fileName'.
setValue(double)
Add 'value' to the histogram.
sizeByName(double)
Get the number of entries in bucket 'name'.
Width()
Return the width of each bucket.

SimpleHistogram 
  public SimpleHistogram(double min,
                         double max,
                         long nbuckets)
Create with 'nbuckets' evenly distributed over the range 'min' to 'max'.

SimpleHistogram 
  public SimpleHistogram(double min,
                         double max,
                         double w)
Create a number of buckets with width 'w' evenly distributed over the range 'min' to 'max'.

setValue 
  public void setValue(double value) throws IllegalArgumentException
Add 'value' to the histogram. If it is outside the range of the histogram then raise an exception, otherwise find the appropriate bucket and increment it.
